Weather is no longer an excuse—this boot can do it all, and so can you. The gusseted tongue keeps water and debris out, while the fluffy lining retains warmth inside. Natural and synthetic leathers are combined with long eyestays, metal hardware, and hiking boot-inspired laces for a classic outdoor look.

Nike Court Borough Mid 2 provides a structured, supportive fit with a retro basketball design, allowing you to look like a star even when you're off the court. The fluffy insulation inside helps maintain the comfort and warmth of your feet.

When it's colder than the far side of the moon and rain is spitting at you, you still need to look good. From water-resistant leather to a durable outsole, the Lunar Force 1 blends AF-1 style so you can keep your flame burning in any weather. Metal lace hardware and an oversized tongue bring the toughness of hiking boots, while the star-studded toe design adds a distinctive look.

name_shoes: Nike Phantom GX II Acadamy AG Football Boots
description: Looking to take your game to the next level? The Phantom GX 2 Academy helps position you perfectly in front of the goal, whether you're the organizer, passer, or finisher. The rest is up to you. Created with goals in mind, NikeSkin covers the striking area of the cleat while Nike Cyclone 360 traction helps guide your unscripted agility.

name_shoes: Zoom Vapor 15 Academy MDS AG Football Boots
description: Cristiano Ronaldo wouldn't be the competitor he is today without the setbacks he's faced. Designed to elevate your game, this version of the Vapor 15 Academy features disruptive patterns that symbolize the sagas we endure, while energetic green accents represent the breakthroughs that come from overcoming obstacles. You also get an Air Zoom unit, so you can accelerate in the final minutes of a match - when it matters most.

name_shoes: Mercurial Superfly 9 Pro Artificial Ground Football Boots
description: Get ready to conquer the pitch in style with the Nike Mercurial Superfly 9 Pro Artificial Ground Football Boots. Crafted with a minimalist knit upper, these boots significantly reduce weight, allowing for quicker movements by focusing only on the essential elements. The transparent mesh on the upper adds an extra layer of style to these boots, boosting your confidence. Equipped with the all-new Zoom Air unit, they provide an additional level of springy underfoot feel, giving you an extra edge on the field. The Flyknit ankle wrapping provides a secure feel, allowing you to move with extra spring in your step.   These boots feature a secure speed cage inside the structure, made from a thin yet strong material that secures your foot to the outsole, offering super-charged traction. Designed with a unique pattern, they provide enhanced traction even on the most challenging pitches. The new contoured toe box offers better lockdown in the heel, while the cushioned insole adds extra comfort. To complete the design, the Mercurial branding and Nike swoosh symbolize Nike's commitment to excellence. Composition: Upper - Mesh; Sole - Synthetic. Follow care instructions to maintain the boots.

Introducing the next generation of Air technology. The Air Max Dn features our Dynamic Air unit system with dual-pressure tubes, creating a reactive sensation with every step. This results in a futuristic design that's comfortable enough to wear from day to night. Move forward with confidence - Feel The Unreal.

Created for the basketball court but embraced on the streets, the Nike Dunk Low Retro returns with crisp overlays and original team colors. This basketball icon channels the '80s with premium leather in the upper, which looks good and becomes even more comfortable over time. Modern footwear technology brings comfort into the 21st century.

The radiance continues to live on in the Nike Air Force 1 '07, the basketball original that puts a fresh spin on what you know best: durably stitched overlays, clean finishes, and just the right amount of flash to make you shine.

Honor Jordan's first 3 championships with a pair of sneakers that gather details from each respective shoe model and collage them into a fiery homage. Elements from AJ6, 7, and 8 come to life in fresh new ways, right on your feet.

Feel unbeatable from the first swing to the final putt. Inspired by one of the most iconic sneakers of all time, the Air Jordan 1 G instantly becomes a classic on the golf course. With Air cushioning underfoot, the Wings logo on the heel, and an integrated traction pattern to help you make your shots, it delivers all the clubhouse elegance of the original AJ1—plus everything you need to play 18 holes in comfort.

Inspired by the iconic color palette of the 2006 AJ4 release, this Varsity Maize edition of the Spizike Low brings a radiant burst of color to the basketball-inspired classic. It combines distinctive elements from previous Jordan models such as Varsity Maize leather, elephant print details, and a translucent outsole. The result is a blend of layers, textures, and nostalgia from past eras. To complete your look, a Jumpman logo and branded closure system seal the deal.

From the beach to the bleachers, Victori One is an essential sandal for everyday activities. Subtle yet significant updates like a wider strap and softer foam make relaxation effortless. Move forward with confidence - enjoy limitless comfort for your feet.

From the beach to gardening and lounging on the couch, Nike Victori One sandals enhance a classic design. Offering easy and comfortable wear, they feature a softer, more responsive foam. The contoured grip pattern helps support and secure the foot in place.
Slide in and go. Enjoy the cushiony and light foam for beach days or post-game hangouts.

From the beach to the bleachers, the Victori One sandals are perfect for sunny days. Lightweight and easy to wear (or pack for vacation), the soft foam and plush strap make relaxation simple and comfortable.

You've played hard. You've sweated. You've given it your all. Now, there's just one thing left—you need to hit the shower. Don't worry, we've got the perfect solution for you with the Nike Victori One sandals. Their one-piece foam design is soft and comfortable, and the traction pattern on the sole helps on wet surfaces. They dry quickly, so no one will know you just stepped out of the shower as you head to the party.
Looking for a sportier mule? The Jordan Hex Mule utilizes the same bold design made famous by the Hex Slide to offer a closed-toe option that's perfect for seasonal transitions.

Enjoy a peaceful and comfortable experience wherever your day off takes you. Crafted from soft yet responsive foam, these lightweight slides are easy to style and pack. Their water-friendly design makes them perfect for the beach or pool, while their minimalist look is stylish enough for urban settings. It's time to slip into them and unwind.

Nike On Deck are un design simplu și ușor de purtat, fiind sandale ideale datorită capătului rotunjit al prinderei între degete care previne frecarea, talpii intermediare din spumă oferind o amortizare ușoară perfectă. Designul inspirat de modelul Waffle adaugă o notă de tradiție, asigurând tracțiune și durabilitate.

F50 speed, Messi style. In 2024, Lionel Messi's range of adidas football boots are crafted to match his preferences even more closely. The flexible HybridTouch upper on these F50 League boots includes a synthetic tongue for lightweight comfort. Underneath, a lug rubber outsole adds responsiveness on artificial turf.

The heart and soul of a football thoroughbred. Based on the legendary Copa Mundial, these adidas Copa Icon boots keep the ball close with a supple, foot-hugging cow leather forefoot showing off classic stitched details. Inside, a synthetic suede collar lining and tongue keep you comfortable while you're showing how it's done. Underneath, a lightweight firm ground outsole adds stability on dry natural grass.

Engineered for speed, the X isn't just fast. It's Crazyfast. Built with all the specifications needed to gain that peak acceleration, quick just got quicker.

From brain to boot, and back again. Connect with the ball on every level in adidas Copa Pure 2. Fusing a classic feel with cutting-edge performance, these Pro football boots come with a Fusionskin leather forefoot for a silky touch. Designed to keep your play purring, a versatile outsole enhances stability on a range of pitch types.

Passion turns an ordinary sport into a beautiful game. Fall in love with football again in these adidas Copa Gloro boots. Show your class in a soft cow leather upper that moulds to your foot for stability and offers an assured touch when the ball's heading your way. A specialist firm ground outsole keeps you stable on dry natural grass. Stitched details and a fold-over tongue keeps the look classic.

Sometimes simple design is the best design, and these adidas slides embody it. With one-piece construction, they've got a Molded EVA footbed that cushions every step and dries fast. Their streamlined silhouette reflects the heart of adidas: a sleek look made functional for every day.

Whether you're heading to the locker room after an intense gym session or at home recovering on the couch, these slides keep your feet wrapped in lightweight comfort. Pair them with socks and shorts for your post-workout look or with your favorite swimwear for the ultimate beach vibe. The adidas 3-Stripes design completes your sport style.

The coolest way to show off your pedicure. These adidas platform slides look at home by the pool and in the city with 3-Stripes wrapped around the smooth bandage uppers. These sandals have a contoured footbed and a cushioned EVA outsole for maximum comfort.

Ready to conquer the world or just kick back poolside? Slip into the adidas Adilette 22 slides and you'll be prepared for either. With a one-piece construction for ultimate comfort, they're designed to go anywhere your day takes you. Their futuristic design is inspired by topography and the race to space. Natural, bio-based materials provide cushioning with every step so you can keep exploring all day.

From swim to shower and beyond, slip into these adidas Adilette shower slides for cushy comfort. The quick-drying design and slip-on ease are made for post-swim bliss. A bandage-style upper and Cloudfoam footbed combine for a supportive fit. First crafted in '72, this version of the iconic adidas slide shows off an eye catching logo that brings the silhouette into today.

Whether for shower or the beach, these adidas slides keep kids on the go with a quick-drying design. The bandage upper ensures a cozy fit, and the lightweight style is easy to pack up and take along. Every step stays comfortable thanks to a soft, contoured footbed.
